Package core

Class CheckerBoard

java.lang.Object
core.CheckerBoard
public class CheckerBoard extends Object
Checkerboard contains a representation of a checkerboard and pieces
Version:
1.1 2022-01-27
Author:
Tyler Filewich

  • Method Details

    • capturePiece

      public void capturePiece(int row, int column)
      Removes a piece that has been jumped and updates the count.
      Parameters:
      row - The x coordinate of the piece being jumped.
      column - The y coordinate of the piece being jumped.

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(int[] coordinates)
      Moves a chess piece from one square to another and captures the opponent if necessary.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The array containing the starting x coordinate, starting y coordinate, finishing x coordinate, and finishing y coordinate of the move. Must be a valid move.

    • getSquare

      public CheckerBoard.Square getSquare(int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Get a square.
      Parameters:
      row - The Square's x coordinate.
      column - The Square's y coordinate.
      Returns:
      The Square.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index is out of bounds.
